>>Weather Samarkand

In Samarkand, the climatic conditions are categorized as mild and moderate. In Samarkand, precipitation is more abundant during the winter season compared to summer. This location is classified as Csa by Köppen and Geiger. In Samarkand, the mean yearly temperature amounts to 13.6 °C | 56.5 °F. In a year, the rainfall is 550 mm | 21.7 inch.

Samarkand is located in the northern hemisphere. The commencement of summer is observed at the conclusion of June and its culmination takes place in September. The months that constitute this season are known as June, July, August, September. It is highly recommended to plan your visit during the months of June, July, August for an optimal experience.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Samarkand

During August, the amount of precipitation is at its lowest, with only 2 mm | 0.1 inch recorded. The highest amount of precipitation occurs during the month of March, with an average quantity reaching up to 100 mm | 3.9 inch.

average temperature by month Samarkand

The month of maximum warmth in a year is July. The average temperature during this period reaches up to 26.4 °C | 79.5 °F, making it the hottest time of the year. The month of January registers the most frigid temperatures throughout the year, with an average low temperature of 1.1 °C | 34.0 °F.

It is observed that January (70.97) has the highest relative humidity, whereas July (36.26) experiences the lowest. The month with the highest precipitation is March (12.53 days), whereas the one with the lowest amount of rainfall is August (0.73).

Total hours of sun

At Samarkand, the month that boasts of the highest number of daily sunshine hours is June with an average duration of 13.17. The total count for this period accumulates to a staggering sum of 408.38 sunlight hours.

The location of Samarkand experiences the least number of daily hours with sunshine during January, wherein an average of only 6.76 hours is recorded. The total count for this month's sunlight duration accumulates to a sum value equivalent to 209.68.

Throughout the year, Samarkand experiences approximately 3605.12 hours of sunshine. The average monthly duration of sunlight is estimated to be around 118.35.
